_meanings:
{@--1@} Fraud, 
dishonesty; {#arizu hi vijayArTinaH kzitISA#}
{#vidaDati sopaDi saMDidUzaRAni#} <ls>Ki. 1. 45</ls>,

{@--2@} (In law) 
Suppression of the truth, a false 
suggestion; <ls>Ms. 8. 165.</ls>

{@--4@} The
part of a wheel between the nave
and the circumference, or the wheel
itself.
